name: Over repaired
description:
You're a droid and need to repair the ship constantly, because it's falling apart.
The crew is in a cryosleep, so there will be no help.

The ship tells you what broke and what it needs. You have no idea what those parts are, but you know you need it, to save the ship and the crew.

Gameplay:

Find 3 parts laying around in the ship that you can assemble to a toolkit at the workbench. Be careful! Sometimes there are more than 3 parts and you can build the wrong toolkit. Bring the correct toolkit to the broken ship part.

Repeat till you eventually die.

Note: This is the result of the GGJ 2020, so there will probably be no further updates. I just wanted to put it up here on itch, because I was proud of it.
You may encounter some bugs, but the state of the game is stable and very enjoyable.

Also my art assets are available in this free asset package:
https://spark3dvision.itch.io/low-poly-3d-assets
